channel.title: firebase on Hello world
channel.description: Recent content in firebase on Hello world

item.title: A perfect cocktail
item.description: Since I’ve been playing with Github Actions, I started to enjoy using it to build anything, so I thought about using it with Android and Firebase. Because you know, Android and Firebase always are a great mix, but now we will add a new ingredient to create a great cocktail. Our cocktail will help us to deploy an apk file for our tester team, instead of doing it manually we are going to add our magic ingredient: a Github Action workflow!
